org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.SyncNodeCache.Pending

org.ccnx.ccn.impl.sync.SyncNodeCache.Pending Class Reference

This mechanism is used to avoid requesting the same node more than once (see below). More...

Package Attributes

boolean _pending = false

Detailed Description

This mechanism is used to avoid requesting the same node more than once (see below).

One of these objects is created for each node request and used as a java synchronization object to insure that we don't return without having retrieved the node when that is required.
